text: Sorting a counted list in Python

(I am brand new to any kind of programming so please be as specific as you can when you answer)
Problem: I have written a program to solve pythonchallenge.com level 2.
The program works but the results are messy.
I want to sort the results of the character count into a nice looking list.
When I try to sort the results of the character count using sorted() it removes all the counts and just gives me a list of the characters that were in my string.
I need to be able to keep the ability to see how much of each character was in my file.

code:
countstring = open('pagesource.txt').read()

charcount = {}

for x in countstring:
    charcount[x] = charcount.get(x, 0) + 1

print charcount
